name: irrelon-path
description: A powerful JSON path processor. Allows you to drill into JSON objects with a simple dot-delimited path format e.g. "obj.name".

scripts.test: echo "No tests specified, all tests exist inside the parent project ForerunnerDB (http://github.com/irrelon/ForerunnerDB) for now" && exit 1

author: Rob Evans - Irrelon Software Limited
